title: Choices - Book 1 of the Seven Keys Saga
description: Ninteen-year-old Terry Howard is an asshole, but he’s also a survivor. The war that wiped out the majority of the Alliance of Six, the Six Magical Orders that enforced the metaphysical laws of the planet, is over, but their job still has to be done. As an Acolyte of the Order of Midnight, Terry is supposed to be guarding the veil between our world and The Outside.Instead, Terry has been living in a basement apartment with a few friends and trying to figure out how to be a part of human society again. He isn’t good at it.When his ex-girlfriend gets him to investigate an apparent supernatural suicide and his old mentor shows up to pass off the last of his responsibilities, Terry is forced to face the few things he was truly hiding from.His duties, his past, and most importantly, himself.
author: M.A. Brotherton
